physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features seven children. They are all sitting down and looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. All of them are wearing their ethnic costumes, and the background of the photograph suggests that it was taken in the interior of a building. There are patterned designs on the walls and ceilings of the building.
sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows four Peranakan women in baju panjang and batik sarongs seated at the foot of a tree. The caption ‘Straits born chinawomen’ is printed beneath the photograph.
subject_terms_1: group portraits children (people by age group) Peranakan folk costume
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Children Peranakan (Asian people) Ethnic costume
